run_scrabble("ZAEfiee") -> (
[(17, 'FEAZE'),
(17, 'FEEZE'),
(16, 'FAZE'),
(15, 'FEZ'),
(15, 'FIZ'),
(12, 'ZEA'),
(12, 'ZEE'),
(11, 'ZA'),
(6, 'FAE'),
(6, 'FEE'),
(6, 'FIE'),
(5, 'EF'),
(5, 'FA'),
(5, 'FE'),
(5, 'IF'),
(2, 'AE'),
(2, 'AI'),
(2, 'EA'),
(2, 'EE')], 
19
)

run_scrabble("?F") -> (
[(4, 'EF'),
(4, 'FA'),
(4, 'FE'),
(4, 'FY'),
(4, 'IF'),
(4, 'OF')],
6
)
